title: The C Programing Language
authors: Brian W. Kernighan and Dennis M. Ritchie
quote: Nevertheless, C retains the basic philosophy that programmers know what they are doing; it only requires that they state their intentions explicitly.
author: Brian W. Kernighan and Dennis M. Ritchie

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
quote: Every piece of knowledge must have a single, unambiguous, authoritative representation within a system.
author: David Thomas and Andrew Hunt

title: The Mythical Man-month: Essays on Software Engineering
quote: Adding manpower to a late software project makes it later.
author: Frederick Brooks Jr.

title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
quote: Redundant comments are just places to collect lies and misinformation.
author: Robert C. Martin
